row.process:
! Attach python file to prepare running : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RES : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_REQUIRED.CREATE_SERVER : ATTACH_RES "PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.STORE", "CREATE_SERVER", T : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_TASK#pck_websphere_create_server.py" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_UNIX_STYLE : SET &UC4RB_JYTHON_FILE# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
!following are sanity checks on the input data : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.SANITY_CHECK
PATH=$PATH:&UC4_WSADMIN_DIR_PATH#;export PATH : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
: SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = "&UC4_WSADMIN_DIR_PATH#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_UNIX_STYLE : SET &UC4_WSADMIN_DIR_PATH# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
! Create and execute python file using itpa package : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.INCLUDE.CREATE_SERVER : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
